name: Love Hurts (TechyEarth)
description:
Controls:

WASD and Space

‘R’ to restart level

You just went through a breakup and must collect hearts in order to fill up your love meter, but remember, Love Hurts

Theme:

As you go through the levels each level is a different color and the color represents the different feelings and stages of relationships and breakups until inevitably it feels like there’s nothing to live for. “Don’t stop” collecting hearts because as soon as the timer runs out, it's over.

Credit to:

Music- https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GF52rUyMTiQ

Font- https://www.fontspace.com/goodbye-my-lover-font-f18575

(The main menu, end, and death screens do not fit the resolution, but the game does)
